Description.Value: Able to equip training sabers.
Kicks the target and interrupts its current action, preventing that ability from being used for the next 4 seconds.
Purges all incapacitating and movement-impairing effects.
Uses the Force to project a wave of energy toward the target, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage. In addition, standard and weak enemies are knocked senseless, stunned for 4 seconds.
Raises a lightsaber ward, increasing melee and ranged defense by 50% and reducing the damage taken from Force and tech attacks by 25%. Lasts <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Slashes up to 8 enemies within 5 meters in front of you for <<1>> weapon damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.
Strikes the target and up to 8 enemies within 5 meters with the Force, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage. Also stuns weak and standard enemies for <<2>> seconds.

Label.Value: Heroic Moment: Call On the Force

Description.Value: Calls upon the Force to aid you and your companion, immediately finishing the cooldown on Saber Ward and restoring 2% of maximum health every 3 seconds. Requires an active companion. Lasts 1 minute.
Able to equip single-bladed lightsabers.
Throws the main-hand lightsaber at a target, dealing <<1>> energy damage. Only usable on targets at or below 30% max health.

Performs a series of lightsaber attacks that deal <<1>> weapon damage over 3 seconds. Standard and weak enemies are additionally stunned for the duration of the effect. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding. Cannot be interrupted.
Enters a balanced lightsaber form, increasing all damage dealt and reducing all damage received by 3%.
Able to equip vibroswords and other one-handed melee weapons tied to the Strength attribute.
Confounds all nearby enemies, preventing all action for up to 6 seconds. Damage ends the effect prematurely. Has no effect on droids.
Increase movement speed by 35% while not in combat.
Inflicts <<1>> damage with a series of quick melee attacks. Generates 2 Focus. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.
Allows you to pause and reflect to restore your health. Cannot be used during combat.
Increases the target's melee, ranged, Force and tech bonus damage and healing by 5% for 60 minutes. If the target is a group member, all other group members are also affected.
Able to ride speeder bikes.

Jumps to a distant target, dealing <<1>> damage with the main-hand weapon, immobilizing the target for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and interrupting the target's current action. Builds 3 focus. Cannot be used against targets in cover.
Able to equip medium-weight armor.
Slashes the target for <<1>> damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.
Subdues the target, stunning it for <<2>> seconds. Deals <<1>> kinetic damage and builds 3 focus over the duration. This ability can be channeled while moving.
Allows you to wield two one-handed weapons.
Strikes the target multiple times with both lightsabers, dealing <<1>> weapon damage and building 6 focus. Requires two lightsabers.
Let loose a valorous call, immediately building 30 stacks of Centering.
Reduces the damage you take by 99% for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. When the effect ends, 50% of your current health is lost.

Obscures yourself with the Force, becoming difficult to detect, reducing your threat towards all enemies, reducing all damage taken by 50%, and increasing movement speed by 30%. Lasts <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Dealing direct damage ends the effect prematurely.
Enters an offensive lightsaber form, causing your melee attacks to increase all damage dealt by 1% for <<1>> seconds. Stacks up to 5 times. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

Deals <<1>> weapon damage, slowing the target's movement speed to 50% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and reducing the healing it receives by 20% for <<3[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Requires two lightsabers.
Pacifies the target, reducing its melee and ranged accuracy by 90% for 6 seconds. Cannot be used on Operation bosses. This ability does not respect the global cooldown.
Requires and converts 30 stacks of Centering to inspire you and your Operation group members within 40 meters, increasing all damage and healing done by 10%. Lasts <<1>> seconds.
Activating an attack that spends focus and defeating opponents builds Centering. When 30 stacks of Centering are built, you become Centered, enabling the use of Zen, Transcendence and Inspiration.

Requires and converts 30 stacks of Centering to issue Transcendence to you and your group members within 40 meters, increasing movement speed by 50% and melee and ranged defense by 10%. Lasts <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.

Reduces all damage taken by 20% and deals <<1>> energy damage to attackers. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds. Lasts <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Rebuke refreshes to its full duration when attacked, but this effect cannot last more than <<3[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds in total.

Shuts down the target droid, incapacitating it for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. While disabled, the droid's systems reboot, causing non-standard and non-weak droids to heal rapidly. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. Only one droid can be disabled at a time.

Throws both lightsabers in a straight line towards the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage to all enemies directly in front of you up to 30 meters away. Affected enemies are slowed by 50% for <<2>> seconds. Requires two lightsabers.

Requires and converts 30 stacks of Centering to enter a Zen state. Lasts for 6 charges. This effect varies based on your current lightsaber form: Shii-Cho Form: Instantly generates 4 focus, plus 8 additional focus over the next few seconds. Juyo Form: Increases the critical chance of your burn attacks by 100% and causes burn damage to heal your group for 1% of max health each tick. Ataru Form: Grants 30% alacrity. Each attack consumes 1 charge.

Slash, Cyclone Slash, Dispatch, Blade Rush, Merciless Slash, and Concentrated Slice refund 1 focus when used. In addition, Zealous Strike beats down its target for <<1>> seconds. Beat Down targets take 5% more damage from melee attacks.
Increases the amount of Centering built by 2 when activating abilities that consume focus, and reduces the cooldown of Valorous Call by 30 seconds.
Strikes the target for <<1>> weapon damage and deals an additional <<2>> elemental damage over <<3[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Requires two lightsabers.
Calls on the power of the Force to melt the target, causing it to burn for <<1>> elemental damage over <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.

Charges your lightsabers with deadly energy for 15 seconds, causing your next 3 successful melee attacks to make the target burn for <<1>> elemental damage over 6 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Requires Juyo Form.
Critical hits with burn effects heal you for 1% of your maximum health.
Your burn effects have a 20% chance to build 1 focus when dealing damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 4 seconds.
Dealing burn damage to a target increases your damage reduction by 5% for 3 seconds.

Your direct damage attacks that critically hit a burning target build 1 focus. This effect cannot occur more than once 4 seconds. In addition, Merciless Slash makes its target assailable for <<1>> seconds. Assailable targets take 7% more elemental and internal damage.
Increases the critical strike damage of your burn effects by 15%.

Strikes the target with both lightsabers for <<1>> weapon damage. Each use of this ability grants Merciless for <<2>> seconds, lowering the cooldown of your next Merciless Slash by 1.5 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Requires two lightsabers.
Juyo Form can now stack up to 6 times, and Merciless Slash can now stack up to 4 times in total.
Your burning effects have a 20% chance to grant Mind Sear which increases the damage of your next Twin Saber Throw by 100%. This effect can only occur once every 18 seconds.
Force Leap generates 1 additional focus.
Your burn effects are 2% more likely to critically hit per stack of Juyo Form.
Reduces the minimum range of Force Leap by 10 meters and its cooldown by 3 seconds.
Increases the direct damage dealt by Cauterize by 5%.
Force Sweep spreads your Cauterize and Force Melt burns to targets it hits, if it hits a target already affected by those burns.
Juyo Form and Merciless build two stacks at a time. Merciless Slash also builds up to 3 Accelerating Victory stacks, which reduce the cost of the next Force Melt.
Slices the target for <<1>> weapon damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.
Leaps to a target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage and immobilizing the target for 1 second. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.
Blasts the enemy target with a powerful burst of Force energy, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage.
While Shii-Cho Form is active, Concentrated Slice grants Concentrated Defense, increasing your defense chance by 10% for <<1>> seconds.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, damage dealt by Force Exhaustion grants Koan, increasing the damage dealt by your next Force Sweep or Focused Burst by 5% and reducing the focus consumed by your next Force Sweep or Focused Burst by 34%. Koan stacks up to 3 times. Additionally, Zen instantly grants 3 stacks of Koan when used while Shii-Cho Form is active.

Slash and Cyclone Slash deal <<1>> additional Force energy damage. In addition, damage dealt by Force Sweep and Focused Burst overwhelms targets for <<2>> seconds. Overwhelmed targets take 10% more damage from area attacks.

Reduces the cooldown of Zealous Leap by 3 seconds, and while Shii-Cho Form is active, Force Leap and Zealous Leap make your next Blade Storm deal 5% more damage and generate 1 focus, rather than consume focus.
Force Leap and Zealous Leap make your next Force Sweep or Focused Burst used within <<1>> seconds an automatic critical hit.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, Strike, Zealous Strike, Slash, Cyclone Slash, Blade Storm, Dispatch, and Concentrated Slice reduce the active cooldowns of Force Sweep, Focused Burst, and Zealous Leap by 1 second.
Increases all damage dealt by 5% for <<1>> seconds after dealing damage with Force Sweep or Focused Burst. This effect cannot occur more than once every 8 seconds.

Progressively slows the target from 50% to 5% movement speed over <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and deals <<3>> kinetic damage each second. At the end of the duration, the target is crushed and takes an additional <<2>> kinetic damage.
Shii-Cho Form increases armor penetration by 30%.
Increases the critical strike damage of all attacks by 15%.
Zealous Leap and Force Exhaustion each consume 1 less focus.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Sweep by 40% and reduces the cooldowns of Force Sweep and Focused Burst by 3 seconds each.
Increases the damage you deal with saber attacks by 5%.

Increases the critical strike chance of Slash, Cyclone Slash, Dispatch, and Concentrated Slice by 5%. In addition, Master Strike builds 1 Centering each time it deals damage to a target, even during Zen.
Generates 4 Focus when stunned, slept or knocked down.
Force Leap, Force Melt, Clashing Blast, and Zealous Leap snare the target, reducing its movement speed by 50% for <<1>> seconds.
Each use of Strike, Zealous Strike, and Leg Slash reduces the active cooldown of Rebuke by 3 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Stasis by 15 seconds.
Increases the duration of Guarded by the Force by 2 seconds.
Cyclone Slash deals 25% more damage.
While Rebuke is active, it generates 1 focus whenever you are attacked. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Reduces damage taken from area effects by 30%.
Increases the damage dealt by Rebuke by 15% and increases its duration by 4 seconds.
When Transcendence is applied or refreshed, it purges movement-impairing effects. Additionally, the movement speed bonus of Transcendence is increased by 30%.
Getting attacked while Saber Ward is active heals you for 3% of your maximum health. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Increases the duration of Force Leap's immobilize effect by 1 second.
Reduces the cooldown of Awe by 15 seconds. In addition, you build up to 30 Centering over the course of using Introspection. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases the range of Pacify by 6 meters and allows Rebuke to be used while stunned.
Reduces the cooldown of Guarded by the Force by 30 seconds.

Leg Slash consumes 2 less focus. In addition, using Leg Slash against a target already slowed by your Leg Slash immobilizes that target for 3 seconds. This immobilizing effect cannot be applied to the same target more than once every 10 seconds.
Increases the duration of Force Camouflage by 2 seconds and further increases the movement speed bonus of Force Camouflage by 20%.

You build 2 Zen when attacked. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds. Additionally, the effect of your lightsaber forms are improved while they are active: Shii-Cho Form: Further increases damage reduction by 2%. Juyo Form: Increases internal and elemental damage reduction by 5%. Ataru Form: Increases your movement speed by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Pacify by 15 seconds and Force Kick by 2 seconds.
Force Camouflage removes all cleansable effects when activated.
Master Strike immobilizes the target for the duration of the ability.
When your Ataru Form deals damage, your damage reduction and melee and ranged defense are increased by 2%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts <<1>> seconds.
Increases damage reduction by 2%. In addition, Twin Saber Throw builds 2 focus.

Damage dealt by Ataru Form triggers Hand of Justice, which finishes the cooldown on Dispatch and makes your next Dispatch usable on a target at any health level without consuming any focus. This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds.

Enters an acrobatic lightsaber form, increasing alacrity by 3%. In addition, your successful melee attacks have a 20% chance to trigger a second strike that deals <<1>> weapon damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Increases armor penetration by 100% for <<1>> seconds. Requires two lightsabers.

Damage dealt by Ataru Form grants Opportune Attack, which makes your next Blade Storm or Clashing Blast deal 5% more damage and sunder the target for <<1>> seconds. Sundered targets have their armor rating reduced by 20%.

Strikes the target with both weapons for <<1>> weapon damage and automatically triggers an Ataru Form strike, bypassing Ataru Form's rate limit. For 6 seconds after using Blade Rush, your Ataru Form has an extra 30% chance to be triggered. Requires two lightsabers.
Unleashes a powerful blast of Force energy at the target, dealing <<1>> energy damage. The blast stuns standard and weak enemies for <<2>> seconds. Shares a cooldown with Blade Storm.
Increases the damage dealt by your triggered Ataru Form attacks by 5%.
While Ataru Form is active, Cyclone Slash triggers an Ataru Form strike on each enemy target it damages.
While Ataru Form is active, Zen reduces the focus consumed by Blade Rush and Cyclone Slash by 1.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Blade Rush and Clashing Blast by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of Zealous Strike by 3 seconds.
When Opportunity is consumed by Blade Storm or Clashing Blast, you build 1 focus.
Increases the damage dealt with offhand lightsaber attacks by 25%.
Execute now additionally increases the critical chance of Blade Storm and Clashing Blast by 100%.
Reduces the cooldowns of Blade Storm and Clashing Blast by 3 seconds and the focus they consume by 1.

Increases damage reduction by 3% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>, generates 6 focus, and deals <<1>> weapon damage to the target with a series of quick melee attacks. Shares a cooldown with Sundering Strike.

Strikes the target with a powerful blow, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, enabling your Riposte, and impairing the target for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Impaired targets deal 5% less damage with Force and tech attacks. If you are protected by your Warding Strike, Guardian Slash damages up to 7 additional nearby enemies for the same amount. Does not damage sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies. This attack knocks down all affected standard and weak enemies. Generates a high amount of threat.

While in Soresu Form, parrying, deflecting, shielding or resisting an attack has a 50% chance to grant Courage, reducing the focus cost of your next Blade Storm or Dispatch by 1. Lasts up to <<1>> seconds and stacks up to 3 times.
Riposte raises a Blade Barricade, increasing your defense chance by 5% for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Reduces all damage taken by 40% for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Smacks the target for <<1>> kinetic damage, stunning it for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. This ability generates a high amount of threat.
While in Soresu Form, activating Blade Storm grants Blade Barrier, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts up to <<1>> seconds.
Targets damaged by your Force Sweep and Cyclone Slash become unsteady. Unsteady targets have their melee and ranged accuracy decreased by 5% for <<1>> seconds.
Increases the critical chance of Force Sweep by 20%. Additionally, Warding Strike increases shield absorption by 3%.
Increases shield chance by 4% and reduces the cooldown of Saber Ward by 30 seconds.
Force Sweep deals 65% more damage and consumes 2 less focus. Additionally, the critical chance of Cyclone Slash is increased by 20%.
While Soresu Form is active, Riposte consumes no focus and its critical chance is increased by 40%. In addition, the cooldown of Riposte is reduced by 1 seconds while Saber Ward is active.
Increases armor rating by 15%, and when your guarded target is attacked, your movement speed is increased by 30% for 6 seconds.

Reduces the rate limit by which Visionary can generate focus by 3 seconds, and reduces the focus consumed by Blade Storm, Slash, Cyclone Slash, and Guardian Slash by 1. And while in Soresu Form, Slash and Cyclone Slash inflict their targets with Trauma, which reduces the healing received from all sources by 20% for 6 seconds.
Force Stasis no longer needs to be channeled, applying its full effect over 3 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Warding Call by 30 seconds, increases the damage dealt by Hilt Bash and Guardian Slash by 40%, and reduces the cooldown of Riposte by 1 second.
Increases the duration of Enure by 10 seconds. Increases elemental and internal damage reduction by 5%.
Blade Storm causes the target to burn for <<1>> elemental damage over <<2>> seconds.

Increases the damage dealt by your burning effects by 10%. In addition, your Master Strike and burning damage has a 30% chance to trigger Keening, which finishes the cooldown on Dispatch and makes your next Dispatch free and usable on a target with any health level. This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds.

Thrusts your weapon into the ground, causing a Force-empowered shockwave that deals <<1>> energy damage to up to 8 enemies within 5 meters. Stuns weak and standard enemies for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Shares a cooldown with Force Sweep.
Reduces the cooldown of Saber Throw by 5 seconds, and causes Saber Throw to sunder its target for <<1>> seconds. Sundered targets have their armor rating reduced by 20%.
Plasma Brand finishes the active cooldown on Master Strike and generates 3 Focus.
Plasma Brand, Overhead Slash, and Dispatch increase the critical chance of your next Blade Storm by 50%. Lasts <<1>> seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.
Overhead Slash sets the target ablaze for <<1>> elemental damage over <<2>> seconds and beats the target down for <<3>> seconds. Beat Down targets take 5% more damage from melee attacks.
Enters an offensive lightsaber form, increasing all damage dealt by 6% and movement speed by 15%. All attacks that cost focus will refund 1 focus when used.
Executes an acrobatic attack that deals <<1>> weapon damage.
While in Shien Form, Force Leap grants Unremitting, reducing all damage taken by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for <<1>> seconds.
Engulfs your lightsaber in fiery plasma, instantly dealing <<1>> internal damage, with a further <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> internal damage over <<3[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.
Increases damage reduction by 5% at all times and by an additional 15% while Enure is active. In addition, the cooldown of Awe is reduced by 15 seconds.
Increases the critical chance of Plasma Brand, Vigilant Thrust, and burning effects by 10%.
Reduces the cooldowns of Force Sweep and Vigilant Thrust by 6 seconds each, and both abilities no longer consume focus.

Force Sweep and Vigilant Thrust spread your burning effects to all targets they damage, if at least one of the targets is already affected by your burns. In addition, Cyclone Slash deals 25% more damage to burning targets.
Master Strike deals 20% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Overhead Slash by 6 seconds and Blade Storm by 3 seconds.
Freezing Force increases the movement speed of all allies within 8 meters, excluding yourself, by 50% for <<1>> seconds.
When you exit combat, the active cooldowns of Force Leap, Combat Focus, and Saber Throw are reduced by 100%.
Generates 4 Focus when stunned, slept or knocked down.
Taking non-periodic area of effect damage generates 1 focus. This effect cannot occur more than once per second.

For the Defense discipline, Force Sweep slows the targets it damages by 60% for <<1>> seconds. For the Vigilance and Focus disciplines, Force Sweep and Vigilant Thrust sunder the targets they damage for <<2>> seconds. Sundered targets have their armor rating decreased by 20%.
Whenever your movement is impaired, you gain a 5% damage bonus to your next melee ability that costs Focus. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts <<1>> seconds.

Force Leap finishes the cooldown on Force Kick. In addition, Saber Reflect lasts 2 seconds longer, and while Soresu Form is active, generates a high amount of threat on all engaged enemies within 30 meters when activated.
Challenging Call has a <<1>>% chance to protect all allies within range, excluding yourself, granting Guardianship, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts <<1>> seconds.
Getting attacked reduces the active cooldown of Force Leap by 1 second. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Force Leap, Guardian Slash, Overhead Slash, Zealous Leap, and Guardian Leap grant Intervention, which makes your next Freezing Force consume no Focus and activate with a 0.5 second global cooldown.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Stasis by 15 seconds.
Saber Throw immobilizes the target for 3 seconds.
Cyclone Slash deals 25% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Focused Defense by 30 seconds.
Focused Defense removes all cleansable effects when activated.
Increases the duration of Force Leap's immobilize effect by 1 second.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Push by 15 seconds, and Freezing Force no longer consumes any Focus.
Reduces the cooldown of Guardian Leap by 5 seconds and reduces the threat and damage taken by an additional 10% each for the friendly target of Guardian Leap.
Enure increases your movement speed by 50% and grants immunity to movement-impairing effects while active.
Reduces the cooldown of Resolute by 30 seconds and causes Resolute to heal you for 10% of your maximum health when used.
Master Strike immobilizes the target for the duration of the ability.
Reduces the cooldowns of Sundering Strike and Warding Strike by 3 seconds each and increases the focus they generate by 2.
Taunts the target, forcing it to attack you for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Player targets deal 30% less damage when attacking anyone other than you for <<2>> seconds.
Able to equip heavy combat armor.
Generates 1 focus when attacked. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

While active, the guarded player takes 5% less damage and generates 25% less threat. In addition, so long as you remain within 15 meters of the guarded player, 50% of all incoming damage from enemy players is transferred back to you. Requires Soresu Form.
Freezes up to 8 enemies within 8 meters, dealing <<1>> elemental damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Throws the main-hand lightsaber at a distant target, inflicting <<1>> damage and granting 3 focus.

Empowers you with 10 charges of Focused Defense, lasting up to <<2>> seconds. Whenever you take damage a charge of Focused Defense is consumed to heal you for <<1>>. This ability can be used while stunned or otherwise controlled but cannot be used while above 70% health.

Taunts all enemies within 15 meters, forcing them to attack you for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>, if in Soresu Form. If not in Soresu Form, threat will be immediately reduced by a moderate amount. Also, causes affected player targets to deal 30% less damage for <<2>> seconds when attacking anyone other than you.
Leaps to a friendly target, reducing his or her threat by a moderate amount and reducing damage taken by 20% for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.
Deals <<1>> kinetic damage, knocks the target back several meters and knocks the target down for <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Force Push immediately finishes the cooldown of Force Leap.

This invisible passive ability sets a tag for 8 seconds after the Knight parries/deflects/dodges an attack or is missed by an attack while in Soresu Form, or has an attack miss, get parried/dodged while not in Soresu Form.
Temporarily increases your maximum health by 30% for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. When the effect ends, the health is lost.
Able to equip a personal shield generator in your off-hand.
The first 2 seconds of Saber Ward grants 100% melee and ranged defense.

Reflects all direct single target ranged, Force, and tech attacks back to the attacker for <<1>> seconds. The damage done by each reflect is capped, and the cap rises with each new rank of the ability.

Enters a defensive lightsaber form, increasing armor rating by 60%, damage reduction by 6%, shield chance by 15%, threat generation by 100%, and accuracy by 10%. While active, all damage dealt is reduced by 10%, and all Strike abilities generate 1 less focus.
Immediately generates 6 focus.
Able to equip a Force focus in your off-hand.

Ripostes the target for <<1>> weapon damage. Cannot be parried, dodged, or miss. While in Soresu Form, Riposte can only be used after successfully defending against a melee or ranged attack. While not in Soresu Form, Riposte can only be used after one of your melee attacks is parried, dodged, or misses.

Generate 5 Focus and strike the target for <<1>> weapon damage, sundering the target if your discipline is Vigilance or Focus. Sundered targets have their armor reduced by 20% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.

Increases the damage dealt by your weapon by 20% and grants a bonus based on your currently active form: Shii-Cho Form: Increases all Force damage dealt by 3%. Shien Form: Increases all melee damage dealt by 3%. Soresu Form: Increases melee and ranged defense by 3% and increases the threat generated by Force Sweep and Cyclone Slash by 30%.
Slices the target for <<1>> weapon damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.
Leaps to a target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage and immobilizing the target for 1 second. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.
Blasts the enemy target with a powerful burst of Force energy, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage.
Slash, Cyclone Slash, and Riposte deal <<1>> additional Force energy damage.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, damage dealt by Force Exhaustion grants Singularity, increasing the damage dealt by your next Force Sweep or Focused Burst by 5% and reducing the Focus consumed by your next Force Sweep or Focused Burst by 34%. Singularity stacks up to 3 times. Additionally, the cooldown of Combat Focus is reduced by 15 seconds, and Combat Focus instantly grants 3 stacks of Singularity and generates 6 additional focus over <<1>> seconds when used while Shii-Cho Form is active.

Reduces the cooldown of Zealous Leap by 3 seconds, and while Shii-Cho Form is active, Force Leap and Zealous Leap make your next Blade Storm deal 5% more damage and generate 1 focus, rather than consume focus.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, Strike, Sundering Strike, Slash, Cyclone Slash, Riposte, Blade Storm, Dispatch, and Concentrated Strike reduce the active cooldowns of Force Sweep, Focused Burst, and Zealous Leap by 1 second and Combat Focus by 2 seconds.
Force Leap and Zealous Leap make your next Force Sweep or Focused Burst used within <<1>> seconds an automatic critical hit.
Increases all damage dealt by 5% for <<1>> seconds after dealing damage with Force Sweep or Focused Burst. This effect cannot occur more than once every 8 seconds.

Progressively slows the target from 50% to 5% movement speed over <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and deals <<3>> kinetic damage each second. At the end of the duration, the target is crushed and takes an additional <<2>> kinetic damage.
While Shii-Cho Form is active, Concentrated Slice enables Riposte and beats down its target for 45 seconds. Beat Down targets take 5% more damage from melee attacks.
Shii-Cho Form increases armor penetration by 30%.
Increases the critical strike damage of all attacks by 15%.
Zealous Leap and Force Exhaustion each consume 1 less focus.
Increases the critical strike chance of Dispatch and Concentrated Slice by 5%.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Sweep by 40% and reduces the cooldowns of Force Sweep and Focused Burst by 3 seconds each.
Increases the damage you deal with saber attacks by 5%.
